mapper.select: select * from data_board order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into data_board values( (select nvl(max(no),0)+1 from data_board), #{tit }, #{con }, #{writer }, sysdate, 0, 0, #{lock_post }, #{dfile_name}, #{dposter} )
mapper.update: update data_board set tit= #{tit }, con= #{con }, regdate=sysdate, lock_post= #{lock_post }, dfile_name = #{dfile_name}, dposter = #{dposter} where no = #{no }
